item.title: AI on the Go: Anthropic Launches Claude Mobile App
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: San Francisco-based AI company Anthropic is making waves with the launch of its first smartphone app, bringing Claude to mobiles. This move positions Anthropic as a serious contender in the AI game, going head-to-head with industry giants like OpenAI and Google. The new iPhone app caters to both free and paid Claude users. It seamlessly […]
item.content:encoded:
San Francisco-based AI company Anthropic is making waves with the launch of its first smartphone app, bringing Claude to mobiles. This move positions Anthropic as a serious contender in the AI game, going head-to-head with industry giants like OpenAI and Google. The new iPhone app caters to both free and paid Claude users. It seamlessly […]

The post AI on the Go: Anthropic Launches Claude Mobile App appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
